338273.「やっぱり <pc>さんだ！\n 秋祭りに来たの？ 私もね\n ヒューザ兄ちゃん:
I knew it was you! Did you come to see the
Autumn Festival? I did, too. Hyuza
brought me here!

338274.「……ヤボ用のついでに こいつの家に寄ったら\n 祭りの話をされてな。急ぎの仕事:
...I stopped by her place while running an errand, and she told me about this festival. Since I wasn't pressed for time or anything,
I thought why not.

338275.「しかし ナガツキってやつには\n 秋祭りを盛り上げろなんて 言われたが……。:
But then this Nagatsuki person told me to try
and liven things up here...

338276.「どこも かしこも こんな有様だ。\n 客が少なくて とうてい\n 祭りなんて:
It's pretty much this wherever you look.
Doesn't really feel like much of a festival
with so few people around.

338278.「秋祭りへ ようこそ。\n わたくしは カミナヅキ……。\n 神の月に 神の声を:
Welcome to the Autumn Festival. My name is
Kaminazuki... I am able to hear the voices
of the gods during this sacred month.

338279.「神の月に……神の声？: Voices of the gods...? Sacred month?

338280.「色めく秋は 神の月……。\n この時節にもたらされる 豊穣は\n 神々の恵みに:
The month of the colorful autumn is also the
month of the gods... The bountiful harvest
that comes each year is their blessing.

338281.「わたくしは 秋の実りを 奉納し\n 神々に感謝するための お祭りを開くよう\n:
From the god Falpapa, I received an oracle...
He commanded me to hold a festival to
offer up our harvest to show our gratitude.

338282.「まあ 豊作を 願うだけ願っておいて\n かなっちまったら 知らんぷり……なんて:
Well, if you pray for a good harvest and then
ignore it when it actually comes... Not sure
the gods would feel so good about that, yeah?

338283.「カミナヅキさん すごいなあ……。\n 私と 年も近そうなのに 神様の声を聞いて:
Wow, you're amazing, Ms. Kaminazuki...
We're about the same age, but you can
hold your own festival and even talk to gods!

338284.「その祭りなんだが……盛り上がってるようには\n 見えねえな。これで 神サマへの:
Speaking of the festival...it doesn't seem
like there's much to it. Are you sure this
is enough to show our thanks?

338285.「この来客の少なさは……\n いったい どうしたことでしょう。\n すぐに 原因:
There's so few visitors... But why?
There must be some reason... I must
know why, and soon...

338286.「……えっ！？\n 小さい おじいさんが 空を飛んでる！:
Huh?! A tiny old man just flew through
the sky!

338287.「はあ？ なに言ってんだ お前。\n そんなもん どこにも いねえよ。:
Huh? What's that all about? You sure you
didn't just imagine it?

338288.「でも ここにいるし 声も聞こえるよ。\n えっとね……梅干しと かつお節が 足:
But he's right here, and I can hear what he's
saying... Um... He says "We're short on
pickled plums and bonito flakes!"

338289.「……たいへん 申し訳ありません。\n すぐに ご用意いたします。:
I am awfully sorry...
I will have those prepared right away.

338290.「じつは……この秋祭りには\n ヒトだけではなく 神々も お招きして\n おもて:
The truth is...this festival is not just for
us mortals. We also hold a banquet for
the gods so they will be entertained.

338291.「今のお方は お米つぶの神様で……宴会場には\n ほかにも 畑の神様や クワの神:
The one you just saw is the god of rice grain. Within the banquet hall are many other gods, such as the god of fields and the god of
cultivating.

338292.「こちらの神々の姿は わたくしのように\n 神通力を持つ者か……幼子のなかでも\:
The gods may only be seen with those with
divine power, such as myself...or by
children, who are pure of heart.

338293.「なるほど そういうことかよ。\n オレはもちろん <pc>にも\n 見えてねえ:
Uh huh...so that explains why <pc>
and I aren't able to see anything.

338294.「……申し訳ありません。秋祭りに\n 問題が生じていることは 把握しましたが\n:
My apologies... I understand that there are
problems with the festival now. However,
I must make my way to the banquet hall.

338295.「つまり……あのカミナヅキって ガキが\n 神サマのもてなしとやらで 手一杯で\:
In other words...that kid Kaminazuki is too
busy entertaining the gods that she's got
no time to run the festival.

338296.「私……カミナヅキさんの お手伝いしてくる！\n 私にも 神様の姿が 見えるから:
I'm gonna help her! I can see the gods too,
so... I think I might be able to do something.

338298.「だっ 大丈夫！ ヒューザ兄ちゃんは\n ここにいて……お祭りには 無理して\n:
I...I'll be fine! I know the only reason
you came to the festival was 'cause
of me...

338299.「私 前よりも 強くなったんだよ。\n 兄ちゃんと 約束したとおり……。\n だ:
But I've gotten stronger from before, just
like I promised...so I'll be okay!

338300.「……オレも 何か 手伝おうかって\n 言いたかったんだが。:
...I wanted to say that I was willing to
help out, too.

338301.「わりぃ <pc>。\n ソーミャの様子を 見てきてくれねえか……？\n 西のほ:
Sorry to ask, <pc>.
Could you go and check Somya for me?
Looks like she headed west.

338302.「<pc>様と ソーミャ様の ご尽力により\n 秋祭りは盛況……神々も およろこ:
I owe you both my heartfelt gratitude... Thanks to your efforts, the Autumn Festival now prospers, and the gods are quite
delighted.

338303.「屋台にも お客さんが いっぱい……。\n <pc>さんの おかげだね。\n あ:
There are so many people at the stalls now!
Thanks for helping me, <pc>!

338304.「ねえ カミナヅキさん。\n よかったら……その。\n ……いっしょに 屋台を見:
Say, Ms. Kaminazuki...
If you don't mind, um...would you like
to go check out the stalls with me?

338306.「あ…そ……そうですね。\n 式神を増やして 神々の おもてなしにも\n 余裕が:
Ah, well, I... As we now have more shikigami
to entertain the gods, I suppose it would
be okay...just for a little.

338307.「よかった……！\n えへへ 何から見ようか！:
I'm so glad! Hee hee...
Which one should we go to first?

338309.「あれっ この子……カミナヅキさんが\n 新しく作った 式神の子だよね。:
Oh, this...this is one of the new shikigami
you created, right?

338311.「お祭り 盛り上がったけど～。\n 盛り上がりすぎて おしくらドングリ。\n ケ:
The festival's been quite lively... But it got a bit too lively, like a bunch of acorns flying around... There was
even a fight!

338312.「……わかりました。すぐに 向かいます。\n 荒事に対処する式神も 作らねばなり:
I see... I'll head there right away.
I suppose I'll need to create a shikigami
to deal with situations like these.

338313.「だっ……大丈夫！\n 私のことは気にせず 行ってきて。:
I-I'll be fine, so don't worry about me!
Go on ahead!

338315.「お祭りのことは ウチに任せて\n お友達と 遊んできなよ。\n ……ミナちゃん:
Go have fun with your friend, Mina!
Leave the festival to us!

338317.「ウチ 霊感とか そーゆーの全然ないから\n ミナちゃんのこと 手伝えなくて……:
I don't have any special powers or anything,
so I couldn't really help you there...so I
helped with attracting more guests.

338318.「でも お祭りの トラブル対応とかなら\n ウチにもできるもん！\n 強そうな:
But don't worry! I'll handle any sort of
trouble! Look, I even hired this tough
looking bodyguard!

338319.「秋祭りを盛り上げるって 約束したはずだ……と\n 強引に 押し切られちまってな:
I was supposed to help liven this place up...
but I guess my arms are tied.

338320.「オレは 仕事が入っちまった。\n わりぃが カミナヅキ……オレの代わりに\n:
So I've got some stuff to do now.
Sorry, but do you think you could look
after Somya for me?

338322.「行こっ ソーミャちゃん！\n ミナね 花火やってみたい！:
Come on, Somya! Let's go see the fireworks
together!

338323.「あっ……へへ。\n 行こっか……ミナちゃん！: Hee hee, okay... Let's go, Mina!

338324.「秋祭りは大成功だし 妹には 友達ができた！\n キミには 感謝しても しきれな:
The festival's a huge success, and my sister
even made a new friend! It's all because
of your help, so hereーit's yours!

338325.「……今 渡した おまつりドングリについて\n 説明するから この後 ウチのとこ:
About those acorns I just gave you...
Would you mind coming to see me so I
can explain? Promise you won't regret it!
